item.description:
æˆ‘æœ‰ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·é—®ã€‚ æˆ‘æ­£åœ¨å¯»æ‰¾æœ€ä½³æ¨¡å‹æ¥æè¿°æ¯å¹³æ–¹ç±³ç§Ÿé‡‘ ï¼ˆrentsqmï¼‰ï¼ˆæ¯å¹³æ–¹ç±³ç§Ÿé‡‘ï¼‰ã€‚è¿™ä»…å–å†³äºé¢„æµ‹å› å­ ï¼ˆé¢ç§¯ï¼‰ã€ï¼ˆyearcï¼‰ã€ï¼ˆä½ç½®ï¼‰ã€ï¼ˆæµ´å®¤ï¼‰ã€ï¼ˆå¨æˆ¿ï¼‰ã€ï¼ˆä½œå¼Šï¼‰ã€‚ ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯ å®ç° 50% çš„è§£é‡Šæ–¹å·®ï¼ˆå³å¹³å‡å€¼ï¼šadj.r.square=0.5 è‡³å°‘ï¼‰æ•°æ® ï¼ˆdata<-gamlss.data::Rent99ï¼‰ï¼ˆæ…•å°¼é»‘ç§Ÿé‡‘ï¼‰ã€‚æˆ‘åœ¨ R ä¸­å°è¯•äº† (rentsqm)ï¼Œå€ŸåŠ© GAM æ¨¡å‹å’Œ gamlss æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ å…¥äº†äº¤äº’ä½œç”¨å’Œä¸åŒçš„åˆ†å¸ƒæ—ï¼Œä½†åªå¾—åˆ°äº† 42%ã€‚ packages <- c("ggplot2", "dplyr","lme4", "mgcv","stats", "tidyr", "splines", "gamlss","MASS") lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)
data1 <- gamlss.data::rent99 data <- dplyr::select(data1, rentsqm, area, yearc, location, bath, kitchen, cheating)
View(data)
summary(data)
Model_1 <- gamlss(rentsqm ~ pb(area) + pb(yearc) + location*bath * kitchen * cheating, sigma.formula = ~pb(area)+ pb(yearc) + location*bath * kitchen * cheating, nu.formula = ~pb(area)+ pb(yearc) + location*bath * kitchen * cheating, family = BCCG , data = data) Rsq(Model_1) #0.42 Model_2 <- mgcv::gam(rentsqm ~ s(area)+s(yearc) +s(yearc, by= area)+s(yearc, by= location)+s(area, by=location )+location*cheating*bath*kitchen + location +cheating + bath + kitchen +te(area,yearc), data=data) glance(Model_2) #r.square.adjust=0.39

df <- data.frame( y = c(1.2, 2.4, 3.1, 4.5, 5.6, 6.3, 8.6), a = c(0.5, 1.3, 1.7, 2.2, 3.1, 3.8, 4.0), b = c(2.1, 2.7, 3.3, 3.8, 4.2, 4.5, 5.1), weights = c(0.7, 1.4, 0.9, 1.1, 1.0, 0.8, 1.2) )
